title: Progressive Group Roiled by Accusations Diversity Leader Misrepresented Her Ethnic Background
description:
The controversy at the American Friends Service Committee puts a spotlight on the “diversity and equity” industry’s shortcomings.

The post Progressive Group Roiled by Accusations Diversity Leader Misrepresented Her Ethnic Background appeared first on The Intercept.

title: GOP Megadonor Is Funding a Far-Right Israeli Think Tank — and Establishment Democrats
description:
Pennsylvania billionaire Jeffrey Yass is bankrolling groups dedicated to shutting down critiques of Israeli human rights abuses.

The post GOP Megadonor Is Funding a Far-Right Israeli Think Tank — and Establishment Democrats appeared first on The Intercept.
